name: src/Leaflet.TOC.Control.js
src/Leaflet.TOC.NestedDynamicMapLayer.js
src/Leaflet.TOC.NestedLayer.js
generateID
description:
Generate a ID number guaranteed to be unique.
IDs are composed of a pseudorandom 4-digit number suffixed by an incrementing counter.

name: NestedLayer
description:
Wraps a Leaflet Layer to allow that layer to be the "parent" of other layers by having
"child" layers

params.name: layerID
params.description: ID of the layer on the origin.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the layer on the origin; display-friendly

name: layerID
description: Layer ID as specified by the server

name: minZoom
description: Minimum zoom level for this layer to be visible

name: maxZoom
description: Maximum zoom level for this layer to be visible

name: id
description: Unique ID generated for each NestedLayer

name: enabled
description: Whether the user may freely toggle this layer on and off

name: src/Leaflet.TOC.NestedLayerTreeHelper.js
applyStateChangeToTree
description: Applies a state change (or changes) to a tree or substree

params.name: change
params.description: A key/value pair of state changes to apply to each layer in the tree
